Articles.Content:
After a few minutes playing KSP 1.1.2 (windows 32 bit, non-steam version), the screen goes black and I hear a device disconnected noise. I can only assume that it is causing my GPU to crash, as I can still hear the game running in the background, I just can't see anything. I am then forced to hard reset my computer. This happens every time I run KSP 1.1.2, it has never happened with previous versions or with other games. This is a clean install with no mods.

Output.log: http://pastebin.com/5BUqKtBt

dxdiag: http://pastebin.com/8ZGKrPMA
